title: 3 Trump revelations in Epstein files
shortDescription: New Epstein files reveal President Donald Trump’s jet trips, Mar-a-Lago subpoena and photo with Ghislaine Maxwell.

title: Supreme Court won't let Trump deploy National Guard in Chicago
shortDescription: In a rare loss for Trump at the high court, the justices kept in place a temporary hold on the use of National Guard troops to quell protests in Chicago.

title: See more Epstein files that mention Donald Trump
shortDescription: The Epstein files released by the U.S. Justice Dept. on Dec. 23, 2025, contain several references to Donald Trump.

title: Why does the US want Greenland? What Trump has said
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said 'we need Greenland for national security' and denies it is due to the minerals there. The island is a territory of Denmark

title: US rep sues Trump, calls Kennedy Center renaming 'flagrant violation'
shortDescription: Ohio Rep. Joyce Beatty sued President Donald Trump and members of the board of the Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts over the center's renaming.

title: Trump says US needs Greenland
shortDescription: Trump named Louisiana Governor Jeff Landry special envoy to Greenland, drawing renewed criticism from both Denmark and Greenland.

title: Greenland leader 'sad' over Trump’s special envoy appointment
shortDescription: President Trump has renewed his interest in acquiring Greenland by appointing Louisiana Gov. Jeff Landry to be his envoy for the Arctic island.

title: Trump administration investigating Brown security after mass shooting
shortDescription: The investigation is looking into what happened on campus before, and in the aftermath, of the shooting for potential violations of federal law.

title: Navy to build Trump-class battleships
shortDescription: President Donald Trump announced the Navy will build the largest battleships ever with hypersonic weapons and nuclear capability.

title: President Trump says US needs Greenland for 'national security'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump told reporters on Dec. 22 that the special envoy he appointed would "lead the charge."

title: Trump says 'big boy' Bill Clinton can handle photos on Epstein files
shortDescription: The Trump administration is putting thousands of documents online under a deadline imposed by Congress as part of the Epstein Files Transparency Act.

title: Trump comments on Bill Clinton in Epstein files
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said "Bill Clinton is a big boy" and called releasing Epstein photos a "terrible thing."

title: Trump unveils new battleships as part of ‘Golden Fleet’ initiative
shortDescription: President Trump announced the construction of two new "Trump-class" of battleships that would be the first in a "Golden Fleet" of Navy ships.

title: Trump says Navy will build new 'Trump-class' battleships
shortDescription: President Donald Trump announced a new 'Trump-class' of Navy battleships armed with hypersonic weapons, cruise missiles and nuclear weapons.

title: EU and Denmark criticize Trump’s Greenland envoy
shortDescription: President Donald Trump appointed Louisiana Gov. Jeff Landry as U.S. envoy to Greenland, sparking sharp criticism from Denmark and the EU.

title: Trump declared new federal holidays. He once said US has 'too many holidays'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump declared Christmas Eve and December 26 holidays for federal workers. But other businesses are not obligated to do the same.
